duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and assess applications and financial requirements to determine risk acceptability based on company guidelines.
Utilize underwriting tools and strategies to ensure adherence to underwriting guidelines.
Maintain awareness of state/territory regulations and industry trends.
Attend client meetings and social outings to build and maintain relationships.
Mentor Underwriting Trainees and junior underwriters.
Collaborate with Loss Control property engineers to qualify risks and support compliance with Loss Prevention recommendations.
